content: friends frame mug rug & placemat thank you for your interest in my pattern this pattern has not been tested so if you find typographical or numerical errors please inform me so i can correct it i can be contacted via facebook or instagram happy hooking finished size mug rug 6 x 8 purple middle measures 4 x 6 placemat 10 x 12 purple middle measures 8 x 10 materials worsted weight #4 yarn -150 4mm hook mug rug yards- mug rug 8mm hook placemat bulky #5 yarn -200 yards- needle placemat scissors o note i used 3 strands of worsted #4 held together to make my placemat gauge not necessary but your finished size may vary stitches us terms slip_stitch -slip_stitch single_crochet -single double_crochet -double skip -skip crochet crochet st -stitch half_double_crochet -half double tc -treble/triple chain -chain crochet crochet pattern notes cotton yarn is recommended as it can be washed and withstand hot containers pattern is worked the exact same for mug rug and placemat only change yarn and hook size pattern is worked in one piece no sewing necessary 3 single_crochet would work as one single_crochet in each of the next three stitches 3 single_crochet in same stitch would work as three single crochets in same stitch designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items with purple using the c2c block method complete a rectangle of 6 x 9 blocks there are plenty of tutorials to learn c2c here is one by lion brand no affiliation if you need written instructions they are below as follows **note i like to chain 5/chain 2 for each block
